definition: in large part/the greater part/the majority
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Agriculture consists largely of subsistence farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 在农业中占很大部分的是种植业和畜牧业。

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情况下，把教育时间写进去是个好主意。

sentences.english: The amount of time you spend alone has little to do with being lonely.
sentences.chinese: 你大部分独自一人的时间想必和寂寞扯不上什么关系。
你们大部分人采访报道过我。

sentences.english: Lord, we are responsible for much of the suffering in this world.
sentences.chinese: 主啊，我们对世界上的苦难要付上大部分的责任。

sentences.english: Most of the scenes are written in verse, but some are in prose.
sentences.chinese: 她所写的诗大部分都是无韵诗。

sentences.english: The bulk of our nutritional needs come from fruits, vegetables, and grains.
sentences.chinese: 我们所需的营养大部分都来自于水果，蔬菜和谷物。

sentences.english: Europe and Russia accounted for bulk of tobacco exports in the current year.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和俄罗斯占本年度烟草出口的大部分。

sentences.english: Perhaps, but many entrepreneurs go through a grind-it-out phase.
sentences.chinese: 可能吧，但大部分创业者都会经历一个艰难期。

sentences.english: Ischemic colitis commonly occurs in the elderly and has a wide clinical spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的虚血性大肠炎发生在老年人。

sentences.english: All their costs, including study and living expenses, will be covered by the fund.
sentences.chinese: 包括通信费在内的大部分支出，都会由公司支付。

sentences.english: Among hardiest of cherimoya, does well in most present growing areas.
sentences.chinese: 耐寒其中荔枝，做得好，目前大部分主产区。

sentences.english: Most analysts assumed that Inouye would liquidate the company.
sentences.chinese: 大部分分析人士认为Inouye将清算公司。

sentences.english: Curse of the Golden Flower takes place mostly within the confines of the palace itself.
sentences.chinese: 《满城尽带黄金甲》大部分故事发生在宫廷里面。

sentences.english: Most people think of wax for protecting their car's paint, but Car Care provide paint sealants as well.
sentences.chinese: 大部分人认为蜡保护油漆，但是密封胶也有此功能。

sentences.english: Most of these loans have not yet been used, or drawn down.
sentences.chinese: 这些贷款的大部分还没有被使用或入资。

definition: for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
for the most part/on the whole/also pr. [da4 du1]
for the most part/on the whole/metropolitan
Dadu, capital of China during the Yuan Dynasty (1280-1368), modern day Beijing
